dataList.dlg: Let’s visit the world of wonders.
I’ll tie you up just enough.
To bound over to the next world… Huzzah! Off we go!
Nothing says… that I must be located there… Heheh.
Tadaa~ Transformation complete! Hah, we've a boatload!
The seagulls... They keep crying and screaming away...!
It'll sting~ It won't come off once you're cut.
Filth nests inside me... so that they may be reborn as something useful.
A sorrow-shaken heart bursts... like this.
Cry with me... Let's cry until our bodies burst.
